feed.title: Google Cloud: Config Controller
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Config Controller

entry.content:
Config Controller now uses the following versions of its included products:

  • Config Connector v1.134.1, release notes
entry.summary: Config Controller has been updated with new product versions.
entry.title: Changed: Config Controller Updates

entry.content:
Config Controller now uses the following versions of its included products:

  • Config Connector v1.134.0, release notes
entry.title: Changed: Config Controller Update

entry.content: Config Controller is now available as part of the standard GKE offering and no longer requires GKE Enterprise. For more details on the removal of GKE Enterprise, see the GKE release notes.
entry.summary: Config Controller is now included as a standard GKE feature, eliminating the need for GKE Enterprise. For more information, refer to the GKE release notes.
entry.title: Announcement: Config Controller Now Part of GKE

entry.content:
Config Controller now uses the following versions of its included products:

  • Config Connector v1.132.1, release notes
  • Config Sync v1.21.3, release notes
entry.summary: New product versions for Config Controller.
entry.title: Changed: Config Controller Update
